title: Sad News
author: verias
text: Had a death this weekend, so things are hectic and a bit delayed. Hope you guys enjoy the above. Chrys and Theresa both cosplaying Carol Danvers as Ms Marvel and Captain Marvel respectively.

replies.author: David*Guest*
replies.text: Understood, Keith. Take what time you need, mate

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Sorry to hear it man. Our wishes are with ya.
